_source.title: beryllium_rc2_sb_active_scalability_multinet_lineartopo_descr_viz
_source.visState:
{"title":"beryllium_rc2_sb_active_scalability_multinet_lineartopo_descr_viz","type":"markdown","params":{"markdown":"## Beryllium RC2, Active Switch Scalability with Multinet
- controller: with l2switch plugin installed, configured to respond with mac-to-mac FLOW_MODs to PACKET_IN messages with ARP payload
- topology size per worker node: [12, 25, 50, 100, 200, 300]
- number of worker nodes: 16
- group size: 1
- group delay: 3000ms
- topology type: -Linear-
- hosts per switch: 2
- traffic generation interval: 60000ms
- Packet-In transmission delay: 500ms
- persistence: disabled

Switch topology size scales as follows: 192, 400, 800, 1600, 3200, 4800."},"aggs":[],"listeners":{}}
